Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 12m
Keywords: AELDARI, TELEPATHY, PSYCHIC

Effect: Sensing an approaching crux of destiny, you summon the certainty and confidence of ancient days. Doubt and fear are washed away, and those nearby gain impervious resolve from this indomitable aura. All friendly characters with the AELDARI keyword within range will automatically pass all Resolve tests and are immune to fear, terror, and intimidation-based Interaction attacks until the start of the Farseer’s next turn. In addition, you may Deny the Witch as a Reflexive Action in response to an enemy psychic power used within 25m of you once before their next turn.

Potency: *[2] Affected allies also automatically pass Conviction tests. [1] You gain +1 bonus dice on Psychic Mastery tests to Deny the Witch. === PAGE 315 === Phantasmancy Discipline The psychic abilities of the Shadowseers focus upon illusion and misdirection, the manipulation of fate and the turning of the enemy’s mind upon itself with lethal consequences. So subtle are they that many foes do not even recognise their peril. Fog of Dreams

fog_of_dreams_aoa.name: Fog of Dreams (Abundance of Apocrypha)
fog_of_dreams_aoa.description:
Discipline: Phantasmancy
DN: 5
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 18m
Keywords: AELDARI, TELEPATHY, PSYCHIC

Effect: You send forth your consciousness like a creeping mist, baffling the senses of the enemy. The power affects all enemies in a Blast (6) within range. All attacks made by the affected enemies suffer +2 DN until the start of your next turn.

Potency: *[2] The area affected is a Blast (10). [1] DN penalty increases by +1. Mirror of Minds

mirror_of_minds_aoa.name: Mirror of Minds (Abundance of Apocrypha)
mirror_of_minds_aoa.description:
Discipline: Phantasmancy
DN: 6
XP Cost: 25
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 25m
Keywords: AELDARI, TELEPATHY, PSYCHIC

Effect: A maddening clash of wills consumes the victim’s mind as reality falls away. Select an enemy within range, and both you and the target roll 1d6. If you roll equal to or higher than the target, then the target suffers 1 Mortal Wound. Repeat this until either the target is reduced to 0 Wounds or they roll higher than you.

Potency: [2] If the power reduces the target to 0 Wounds, select another target within 5m of the first, and begin the process again. Each target after the first requires this potency option be selected again. Shards of Light

shards_of_light_aoa.name: Shards of Light (Abundance of Apocrypha)
shards_of_light_aoa.description:
Discipline: Phantasmancy
DN: 7
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 18m
Keywords: AELDARI, TELEPATHY, PSYCHIC

Effect: Blades of polychrome energy dazzle the foe, inflicting horrific and disorienting psychosomatic wounds. The power affects all enemies in a Blast (6) within range. Each target suffers 1 Mortal Wound and is blinded and pinned until the start of your next turn.

Potency: *[2] The area affected is a Blast (10). [2] +1 Mortal Wound per target. Twilight Pathways

twilight_pathways_aoa.name: Twilight Pathways (Abundance of Apocrypha)
twilight_pathways_aoa.description:
Discipline: Phantasmancy
DN: 6
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 5m
Keywords: AELDARI, PSYCHIC

Effect: Eerie half-lit tunnels blink into existence, opening new paths of manoeuvre and attack. You and any number of allies within range may immediately move up to your Speed.

Potency: [2] +1 Speed to all affected characters. === PAGE 316 === Veil of Tears

veil_of_tears_aoa.name: Veil of Tears (Abundance of Apocrypha)
veil_of_tears_aoa.description:
Discipline: Phantasmancy
DN: 6
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 18m
Keywords: AELDARI, TELEPATHY, PSYCHIC

Effect: Sketching a gesture in the air, you snatch the image of your allies from the minds of your foes, hiding them from sight. Select a number of allies equal to your Willpower within range. The affected allies gain +2 Defence and +2 bonus dice on Stealth tests.

Potency: [2] Affected allies gain +1d on Stealth tests. [2] Affected allies gain +1 Defence. Webway Dance

webway_dance_aoa.name: Webway Dance (Abundance of Apocrypha)
webway_dance_aoa.description:
Discipline: Phantasmancy
DN: 6
XP Cost: 25
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 12m
Keywords: AELDARI, PSYCHIC

Effect: The veil between realspace and the Webway grows thin, allowing Harlequins to jink away from danger in directions that shouldn’t exist, only to reappear unharmed moments later. Until the start of your next turn, you and any allies within range may roll Determination without suffering Shock—Icons rolled simply negate Wounds instead.

Potency: *[3] Whenever an ally rolls Determination, they may move up to half their speed afterwards. *[2] Whenever an ally rolls Determination, they may use their Agility instead of their Toughness for the roll. [2] +1 bonus dice on all Determination rolls for affected characters. === PAGE 317 === Revenant Discipline Amongst the Reborn, even those psykers who have honed their powers for centuries will find their abilities augmented by the god of death. Ancestor’s Grace

ancestor_s_grace_aoa.name: Ancestor’s Grace (Abundance of Apocrypha)
ancestor_s_grace_aoa.description:
Discipline: Revenant
DN: 4
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 18m
Keywords: AELDARI, PSYCHIC

Effect: Drawing upon the greatness that is the genetic and spiritual legacy of all Aeldari, you bolster your fellows. Select a number of allies with the AELDARI keyword equal to your Willpower within range. Until the start of your next turn, the affected Aeldari may re-roll all 1s on any skill tests they attempt.

Potency: *[2] Affect a number of allies up to twice the psyker’s Willpower. [2] Affected allies gain +1d on all skill tests. Gaze of Ynnead

gaze_of_ynnead_aoa.name: Gaze of Ynnead (Abundance of Apocrypha)
gaze_of_ynnead_aoa.description:
Discipline: Revenant
DN: 5
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 18m
Keywords: AELDARI, PSYCHIC

Effect: Your eyes blaze with fire as they channel the power of Ynnead. You target one enemy with a psychic ranged attack. If hit, the target suffers 1d3+2 Mortal Wounds.

Potency: [3] +1 Mortal Wound. Shield of Ynnead

shield_of_ynnead_aoa.name: Shield of Ynnead (Abundance of Apocrypha)
shield_of_ynnead_aoa.description:
Discipline: Revenant
DN: 6
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 6m
Keywords: AELDARI, PSYCHIC

Effect: You manifest a shield of spiritual energy around your allies. You and all allies within range gain +2 Defence and +2 Resilience until the start of your next turn.

Potency: [1] Affected allies gain +1 Resilience. [2] Affected allies gain +1 Defence. Storm of Whispers

storm_of_whispers_aoa.name: Storm of Whispers (Abundance of Apocrypha)
storm_of_whispers_aoa.description:
Discipline: Revenant
DN: 5
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 6m
Keywords: AELDARI, TELEPATHY, PSYCHIC

Effect: Your voice joins with those of the dead to drive the foe insane. All enemies within range must make a Fear test (DN 5); enemies who fail this test suffer 1d3+1 Shock, and 1 Mortal Wound if they suffer a complication on their Fear Test.

Potency: [2] Fear test DN increased by +1 [1] Shock inflicted increased by +1 === PAGE 318 === Unbind Souls

unbind_souls_aoa.name: Unbind Souls (Abundance of Apocrypha)
unbind_souls_aoa.description:
Discipline: Revenant
DN: 5
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 18m
Keywords: AELDARI, PSYCHIC

Effect: You reach out with your powers to weaken the bond between soul and body. The power affects all enemies in a Blast (6) within range. Until the start of your next turn, all attacks made against the affected enemies gain +1ED and may re-roll any failures.

Potency: *[1] The area affected is a Blast (10). [1] +1ED to all attacks against the affected enemies. Word of the Phoenix

word_of_the_phoenix_aoa.name: Word of the Phoenix (Abundance of Apocrypha)
word_of_the_phoenix_aoa.description:
Discipline: Revenant
DN: 5
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 18m
Keywords: AELDARI, PSYCHIC

Effect: You call upon the rebirthing energies of the mythical phoenix. The power affects one ally within range; that ally regains 1d3 wounds, or 1d3+2 if they have the YNNARI keyword. If you target an ally who has died since the end f your last turn, they are immediately restored to life. A character resurrected in this way has wounds and shock equal to their maximums.

Potency: [1] +1 Wound healed. === PAGE 319 === WAAAGH! Discipline Weirdboyz channel the power of the Waaagh! into glowing green blasts of psychic destruction, or else yoke those roiling energies to create crude but spectacular results—if, that is, the attempt doesn’t cause their heads to explode like they swallowed a stikkbomb. ‘Eadbanger

da_jump_aoa.name: Da Jump (Abundance of Apocrypha)
da_jump_aoa.description:
Discipline: WAAAGH!
DN: 6
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 12m
Keywords: ORK, PSYCHIC

Effect: You close your eyes tight and, in a storm of flashing green light, you teleport a mass of confused greenskins to another part of the battlefield. Select a number of allies with the ORK keyword equal to your Willpower within range. Those allies vanish, and then reappear moments later anywhere within 100m. They must reappear more than 9m from an enemy, and they forfeit their move in their following turn.

Potency: [2] Affect an additional number of allies equal to your Willpower. *[2] Activation reduced to an Action Da Krunch

da_krunch_aoa.name: Da Krunch (Abundance of Apocrypha)
da_krunch_aoa.description:
Discipline: WAAAGH!
DN: 7
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 18m
Keywords: ORK, PSYCHIC

Effect: Green energies erupt from your eyes, ears, nose, and mouth, and coalesce into a roiling cloud above the enemy. That cloud then solidifies into the vast green foot of Gork (or Mork) himself, which commences to stamp down upon the foe. This power affects all enemies in a Blast (6) within range. Affected enemies take 1d3 Mortal Wounds and are knocked prone. Foes who were already prone become staggered as well. Then, roll a d6: on an Exalted Icon, repeat the power’s effects (repositioning the blast as desired) as the foot stamps down again.

Potency: [2] +1 Mortal Wound. [2] +1 on the roll to repeat the effect. [3] Roll to repeat the power’s effects an additional time. Fists of Gork

fists_of_gork_aoa.name: Fists of Gork (Abundance of Apocrypha)
fists_of_gork_aoa.description:
Discipline: WAAAGH!
DN: 5
XP Cost: 8
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 12m
Keywords: ORK, PSYCHIC

Effect: You channel Waaagh energy into your own fists or those of another Ork, providing strength enough to punch through the armour of tanks. This power affects you or one ally with the ORK keyword within range. Until the end of your next turn, the affected character’s Strength is increased by +4 and they receive +2 bonus dice on all melee attacks.

Potency: [1] +1 Strength [1] +1ED damage on melee attacks. *[2] Activation reduced to a Simple Action === PAGE 320 === Roar of Mork

roar_of_mork_aoa.name: Roar of Mork (Abundance of Apocrypha)
roar_of_mork_aoa.description:
Discipline: WAAAGH!
DN: 7
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 18m
Keywords: ORK, TELEPATHY, PSYCHIC

Effect: You open your gob impossibly wide and give vent to a bellowing roar that reverberates through your enemies’ minds. Coherent thought becomes nigh-impossible, and as the roar thunders on, panic begins to spread. While this power remains in effect, all enemies within range add +2 DN to all Resolve tests.

Potency: [1] +1 DN *[2] Enemies within range must make a Resolve test (DN 3) or become pinned. Warpath

warpath_aoa.name: Warpath (Abundance of Apocrypha)
warpath_aoa.description:
Discipline: WAAAGH!
DN: 6
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 18m
Keywords: ORK, PSYCHIC

Effect: You disperse the Waaagh energy coursing through your frame into the Ork warriors around you, stoking their already bellicose nature into a roaring fever pitch. Select a number of allies with the ORK keyword equal to your Willpower within range. The affected allies add +2 bonus dice to all melee attacks they attempt until the start of your next turn, and they may ignore up to 2 points of DN increase for taking the Multi-Attack or Multi-Action options.

Potency: [1] Increase DN reduction by 1. [1] +1 bonus dice to melee attacks. [2] Affect an number of additional allies equal to your Willpower. === PAGE 321 === Skeinwrought Discipline With access to barrier-tech, all Grimnyr are capable of accessing and manipulating the psychic energies of the Warp despite their species' general resistance to or inability to touch the Immaterium. Grimnyr can smite their foes with blasts of psychic energy, but also are capable of unleashing other psychic abilities as well, making use of what is known as the Skeinwrought Discipline, which takes its name from the special psychoactive cloneskeins that all Grimnyr possess when they emerge from their crucibles. Interface Echo

interface_echo_aoa.name: Interface Echo (Abundance of Apocrypha)
interface_echo_aoa.description:
Discipline: Skeinwrought
DN: 4
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: Self
Keywords: LEAGUES OF VOTANN, PSYCHIC

Effect: You draw empyrically archived Votannic wisdom from within ward-tech augmetic neural buffers and use it to inform your comrades’ battle plan. If the power is successful, you immediately gain 1 Glory.

Potency: [2] Gain +1 Glory *[3] Gain 1 Wrath Fortify

fortify_skeinwrought_aoa.name: Fortify (Abundance of Apocrypha)
fortify_skeinwrought_aoa.description:
Discipline: Skeinwrought
DN: 5
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 12m
Keywords: LEAGUES OF VOTANN, PSYCHIC

Effect: The Kin have a natural belief in their own indomitable fortitude. Employing controlled empyric energies, you cause these beliefs to manifest as temporary physical enhancement. Select a number of LEAGUES OF VOTANN allies within range. Until the start of your next turn, the affected allies add +2 to their Resilience, and gain +2 dice on Determination rolls.

Potency: [1] +1 dice on Determination rolls [1] +1 Resilience Ancestral Wrath

ancestral_wrath_aoa.name: Ancestral Wrath (Abundance of Apocrypha)
ancestral_wrath_aoa.description:
Discipline: Skeinwrought
DN: 5
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 18m
Keywords: LEAGUES OF VOTANN, PSYCHIC, FIRE

Effect: Channelling the grim hatred that all Kin believe their Ancestors hold for their foes, you transmute it into furious destructive energies. White fire leaps from your eyes, your fingertips, and your open mouth, blasting the foe to scattered ashes. This targets all enemies in a Blast (6) within range and line of sight. Enemies affected suffer 12+ 3ED damage with the Force trait. If any of the enemies affected have killed a LEAGUE OF VOTANN character in the current scene, the damage gains the Brutal trait.

Potency: [1] +1ED [2] Increase Blast size by +2. Grudgepyre

grudgepyre_aoa.name: Grudgepyre (Abundance of Apocrypha)
grudgepyre_aoa.description:
Discipline: Skeinwrought
DN: Target’s Willpower (opposed test)
XP Cost: 25
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 18m
Keywords: LEAGUES OF VOTANN, PSYCHIC, FIRE

Effect: Harnessing the Kin’s gestalt hatred for a begrudged foe, you engulfs your victim in a pillar of flame that scours them from existence. Select a single enemy within range and line of sight and make an Opposed Willpower test against them. If you succeed, the target suffers 1d3+3 Mortal Wounds.

Potency: [1] +1 Mortal Wound === PAGE 322 === Null Vortex

null_vortex_aoa.name: Null Vortex (Abundance of Apocrypha)
null_vortex_aoa.description:
Discipline: Skeinwrought
DN: 7
XP Cost: 25
Activation: Full Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 12m
Keywords: LEAGUES OF VOTANN, PSYCHIC

Effect: Unleashing the full contra-empyric power of your barrier tech, you project a null- probability field that causes enemy force shields to flicker and die, and even the most agile foes to fumble weakly in their efforts to evade harm. While this power remains in effect, enemies within range do not benefit from any Invulnerable Armour they possess.

Potency: *[3] Enemies within the power’s range cannot roll Determination. Crushing Contempt

crushing_contempt_aoa.name: Crushing Contempt (Abundance of Apocrypha)
crushing_contempt_aoa.description:
Discipline: Skeinwrought
DN: 5
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Full Action
Duration: 1 Round
Range: 18m
Keywords: LEAGUES OF VOTANN, PSYCHIC

Effect: Your glowering stare bores into the enemy, your manifest disdain and anger intensifying by the moment until they feel its weight as a physical force. It causes them to stagger and strain simply to keep from collapsing altogether. This targets all enemies in a Blast (6) within range and line of sight. Enemies affected suffer 1d3 Shock and must attempt a Resolve test with a DN of 5; if they fail, they are Prone and Staggered until the start of your next turn.

Potency: *[2] Enemies are Restrained instead of Staggered. [1] +1 Shock === PAGE 323 === === PAGE 324 === Chapter IV: Equipment Being a Study of the Many Weapons, Armours, and Tools Employed by the Imperium and Its Foes An Abundance of Apocrypha THOUGHT FOR THE DAY: A warrior's faith in his commander is his best armour and his strongest weapon.

death_hex.name: Death Hex
death_hex.description:
Discipline: Maleficarum
DN: 5
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: A nimbus of sorcerous energy surrounds your target, its tendrils sinking into armour plates and defensive shields, disrupting their function. Whilst this power is sustained, the target halves all Armour (rounding down, to a minimum of 0). If the target also benefits from a Force Shield, the Force Shield ceases to function for as long as this power is sustained. The touch of Death Hex leaves a stain on the target long after the hex ends. Each time you sustain this power for 1 minute, the target gains 1 Corruption.

Potency: [1] +10m Range. [2] Target's Armour is reduced to 0 instead of halved.

diabolic_strength.name: Diabolic Strength
diabolic_strength.description:
Discipline: Maleficarum
DN: 5
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 10m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: Channelling the power of the warp into the target's muscles, they are granted appalling strength and speed. Whilst this power is sustained, the target gains +2 Strength and +1 Speed. The touch of the warp leaves its mark on the target, and the target gains +1 Corruption per minute the power is sustained.

Potency: [1] +1 Strength. [1] +1 Speed. [1] Activation reduced to an Action.

vortex_of_chaos.name: Vortex of Chaos
vortex_of_chaos.description:
Discipline: Maleficarum
DN: 8
XP Cost: 30
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 30m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: Screaming a dread incantation, you tear open a rift in reality. A howling vortex of Immaterium energy erupts, dragging nearby matter into the warp, possibly to be spat out somewhere else entirely. The vortex appears within range, in a Blast (4) area. Any creature in the area must make a DN 5 Strength Test or suffer 2d6 Mortal Wounds. At the start of each subsequent Turn, the vortex moves 2d6 metres in a random direction. Any creature caught in the path or area of the vortex must make the same Test. If you fail to sustain the power, or choose to end it, roll 1d6. On a 1-3, the vortex collapses harmlessly. On a 4-6, it explodes, dealing 1d6 Mortal Wounds to all creatures within 10m. You gain 1 Corruption per Round you sustain this power.

Potency: [2] +1 DN on Strength Tests. [2] +1d6 Mortal Wounds on explosion.

minor_invocation.name: Minor Invocation
minor_invocation.description:
Discipline: Maleficarum
DN: 4
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 5m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You call upon the malign power of the warp to afflict a target with a minor curse. Choose one of the following effects: the target suffers 1d3+1 Shock; the target suffers 1 Mortal Wound; or the target gains the Hindered Condition until the end of their next turn. The target also gains 1 Corruption.

Potency: [1] +1 Shock or +1 Mortal Wound (as appropriate). [1] +5m Range.

warp_storm.name: Warp Storm
warp_storm.description:
Discipline: Maleficarum
DN: 7
XP Cost: 25
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You call down a storm of warp energy in a Blast (6) centred on a point within range. Creatures within the area when it forms, or who enter the area whilst sustained, suffer 1d3 Mortal Wounds and 1 Corruption. At the start of each Turn whilst sustained, all creatures within the area suffer an additional 1d3 Mortal Wounds. The area counts as Difficult Terrain. You gain 1 Corruption per Round you sustain this power.

Potency: [1] +10m Range. [2] +1 Mortal Wound per Turn.

warpspeed.name: Warpspeed
warpspeed.description:
Discipline: Maleficarum
DN: 6
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You channel the warp into your own body, accelerating your reflexes to such a degree that you perceive everything else to be happening in slow motion. Whilst this power is sustained, the target doubles their Speed, and can take an extra Action each Turn. This extra Action does not impose any Multi-Action penalties, and can be used to make a second attack in one Turn. A target affected by this power suffers 1 Corruption at the end of their Turn, as their mind and body is warped by existence out-of-step with reality.

Potency: [1] Activation reduced to an Action. [1] +10m Range.

bolt_of_change.name: Bolt of Change
bolt_of_change.description:
Discipline: Pandaemoniac
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 20m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You unleash a strike of eldritch lightning, triggering a chain reaction of appalling mutations for those caught in the blast. The target takes 15 +9 ED Damage and 1d3 Corruption. When you activate this power, one Agent, Elite, or Adversary who would otherwise be killed by the Damage inflicted is instead irreversibly transformed into a Chaos Spawn, which attacks everyone around them in a suicidal frenzy.

Potency: [1] +10m Range. [2] +1 Corruption. [1] +1 ED Damage.

desecration_of_worlds.name: Desecration of Worlds
desecration_of_worlds.description:
Discipline: Pandaemoniac
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 25
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: The mutating sorcery of the Great Conspirator bleeds from the earth, marring those it obstructs with its profane taint. The target gains 1 Corruption, and immediately rolls on the Perils of the Warp table, as though they were the psyker that triggered the effect. For as long as the power is sustained, the target counts as being in Difficult Terrain, and suffers 1 Mortal Wound whenever they roll a Complication. You suffer 1 Corruption for every minute you sustain this power, as the Warp's intrusion into real space begins to leave its stain on you too.

Potency: [1] +10m Range. [1] +10 to target's roll on Perils of the Warp table. [2] +1 Corruption to target.

boon_of_mutation.name: Boon of Mutation
boon_of_mutation.description:
Discipline: Pandaemoniac
DN: 6
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 10m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You are generous with Tzeentch's dark blessing, spreading a wave of transformative sorceries amongst friends and enemies alike. The target suffers 2 Shock, 1d3 Corruption, and gains a random mutation from the Severe Mutation table. The mutation is so horrific that the target might be hacked apart by their own allies, but if the target survives until the power ends, their flesh returns to normal. Serving as a vector of mutation is an offence upon reality. You suffer 1 Corruption for every minute you sustain this power.

Potency: [1] +10m Range. [2] +1 Shock and +1 Corruption. *[2] Choose any Severe Mutation (except The Warp Made Manifest) instead of rolling.

gaze_of_fate.name: Gaze of Fate
gaze_of_fate.description:
Discipline: Pandaemoniac
DN: 9
XP Cost: 25
Activation: 30 minutes
Duration: 1 Scene
Range: Self
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: Your unquenchable appetite for secret knowledge beckons you into the currents of the Immaterium, where the agents of Tzeentch gleefully indulge you with visions of forgotten pasts and possible futures. For the remainder of the Scene, you roll an extra Wrath Die on all Tests. You roll a second extra Wrath Die on Investigation (Int), Psychic Mastery (Wil), and Scholar (Int) Tests. Whilst using these extra Wrath Dice, you achieve a Wrath Critical if you score an Exalted Icon on any Wrath Dice in your pool, unless you are Dying or making a Test where Wrath Criticals are not possible. However, any Complications rolled trigger a Perils of the Warp effect. In addition, you may beseech the Changer of the Ways to answer a single question about the future. Compared to uses of the Prescience power, the GM's response is likely to be much more detailed and vivid than a short phrase or emotion. However, this flood of forbidden knowledge is often horrifying or destabilising, perhaps requiring a Resolve Test to resist Fear, or a Conviction Test to resist Corruption. Casting Gaze of Fate automatically triggers a Perils of the Warp effect. Add +10 to the roll on the Perils of the Warp table for each Complication rolled as part of the Psychic Mastery (Wil) Test. You may only cast Gaze of Fate once per scene.

Potency: [1] Activation reduced by 5 minutes (minimum 5). *[2] You may ask the GM an additional question about the future.

infernal_flames.name: Infernal Flames
infernal_flames.description:
Discipline: Pandaemoniac
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 10m
Keywords: CHAOS, FIRE, PSYCHIC

Effect: Multi-coloured fires of Tzeentch wreath the target, scorching their bodies and assailing their soul. The target suffers 9 +9 ED Damage and 1 Corruption. If the target loses any Wounds from this attack, they gain the On Fire Condition.

Potency: [1] +10m Range. [1] +1 DN to remove On Fire Condition. [2] +1 ED Damage.

twisting_path.name: Twisting Path
twisting_path.description:
Discipline: Pandaemoniac
DN: 6
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 10m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC, TELEPATHY

Effect: You ensnare the target in the machinations of Tzeentch's Grand Design, revealing maddening alternate futures in which they betray their allies and become a Slave to Darkness. Whilst in this delirious state, they are easy prey for further manipulations. Whilst the power is sustained, the target's Willpower is reduced by 2, to a minimum of 1. Other stats derived from Willpower, such as Shock, Resolve, and Conviction, are reduced by 2 as well, to a minimum of 1. In addition, the target gains 1 Corruption, and immediately makes a DN 3 Fear Test with their reduced Resolve, unless they are immune to the Condition. Whilst invoking the Twisting Path, the caster bears witness to the target's waking nightmare. You suffer 1 Corruption every minute you sustain the power.

Potency: [1] Activation reduced to an Action. [2] Target's Willpower and derived stats reduced by 1, to a minimum of 1.

cacophonic_choir.name: Cacophonic Choir
cacophonic_choir.description:
Discipline: Soulstain
DN: 5
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 10m
Keywords: AUDITORY, CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You issue forth an ear-splitting scream of harmonising horrors, torturing your enemies to the edge of lucidity. All creatures in Range, excluding yourself, suffer 1 Corruption and 1d6+3 Shock.

Potency: [1] +5m Range. [1] +1 Shock. [2] +1 Corruption.

soul_wrack_terror.name: Soul Wrack Terror
soul_wrack_terror.description:
Discipline: Soulstain
DN: Target's Defence
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 5m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You wrench out the soul of your target and consume it utterly, to the appalled dread of the target's allies. The target suffers 1d6 Mortal Wounds. If this Damage is sufficient to kill an Elite Threat, Adversary, or Agent, then all allies of the target within 5m of them must make a DN 3 Terror Test.

Potency: [1] +1 DN on Terror Test. [2] +1 Mortal Wound. *[2] Regain Wounds equal to Mortal Wounds inflicted.

delightful_agonies.name: Delightful Agonies
delightful_agonies.description:
Discipline: Soulstain
DN: 4
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC, TELEPATHY

Effect: You interfere with the mental processes of your target so that pain is perceived as stimulating pleasure, baiting them to seek out extra torments. Whilst the power is sustained, the target suffers no penalties for being Wounded, and suffers no restrictions on actions they can undertake whilst Dying. Furthermore, they gain +1 bonus die on all Tests made whilst Wounded, and +1 bonus die on all Tests for each Traumatic Injury they have.

Potency: [1] +10m Range. [1] +1 bonus die whilst Wounded, +1 bonus die for each Traumatic Injury.

phantasmagoria.name: Phantasmagoria
phantasmagoria.description:
Discipline: Soulstain
DN: Target's Willpower
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC, TELEPATHY

Effect: You invoke visions of such maddening sensation that the target is transfixed by the nightmare, fighting the urge to tear out their own eyes, or succumb to psychic overload. The target suffers the effects of Fear, imposing a +2 DN penalty on all Tests, unless the target is immune to Fear. This Condition cannot be removed until the power ends, at which point the Condition is removed automatically. In addition, whilst the power is sustained, the target suffers 1d6 Shock at the start of each of their Turns. You suffer 1 Corruption for every minute you sustain this power, as you lose perspective on which horrors are real and which are conjured from your imagination.

Potency: [2] +1 Fear Condition (+2 DN on all Tests). [2] +1 Shock each turn.

sensory_overload.name: Sensory Overload
sensory_overload.description:
Discipline: Soulstain
DN: 5
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Touch
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: With a caress and a whisper, you share a vision of the world as perceived by the Dark Prince's faithful, with all sensory perception elevated to its lurid extreme. The target gains 1 Corruption, and whilst this power is sustained, gains +6 bonus dice on Awareness (Int) and Insight (Fel) Tests. Exalted Icons on these Tests may be Shifted for insights beyond the scope of human senses, perhaps allowing the creature to smell lies, hear colours, or taste an upcoming ambush. Complications subject the target to sensory overload, inflicting 1d3 Shock in addition to the usual effect of the Complication. A creature that has beheld the world through the prism of this power is forever changed, perceiving the normal world as drab and depressing in comparison. Some may even become willing servants of the sorcerer, selling their souls for the exhilaration of seeing the world in its true, dreadful form.

Potency: [1] +1 bonus die on Awareness (Int) and Insight (Fel) Tests. [1] Activation reduced to an Action.

subversion.name: Subversion
subversion.description:
Discipline: Soulstain
DN: 6
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: Self
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You expel an aura of acquiescence that puts mortal enemies at ease, convincing them to comply with your whims. For as long as the power is sustained, anyone who looks upon you feels positively disposed to your presence. You may choose how this charisma manifests, allowing you to masquerade as a respected authority, vulnerable innocent, dependable comrade, or intriguing companion. You cannot change your appearance to impersonate a specific individual, nor implant false memories of time you have spent with a stranger. If beheld by someone who has never met you before, they feel a natural kinship, for reasons they cannot rationally explain. Whilst the power continues, enemies will not harm or impede you unless they have orders to do so, or in self-defence. Enemies ordered to attack you are reluctant and remorseful, suffering the Hindered Condition — if a leader is personally present to issue the order, they can make a DN 3 Leadership (Wil) Test as an Action to remove the Condition. You cannot vouch for other creatures to protect them from reprisals, but gain +1 bonus die on Deception (Fel) Tests to convince your "friends" to cooperate with seemingly harmless actions. If you make an attack Test, use a different psychic power, or take any other hostile action, the power ends immediately. Excessive use of this power has caused many to lose sight of their true identity, ensnaring themselves in a web of lies. For every hour you sustain the power, you suffer 1 Corruption.

Potency: [2] +1 Hindered Condition (+1 DN on attack Tests). [1] +1 bonus die on Deception (Fel) Tests.

fleshy_abundance.name: Fleshy Abundance
fleshy_abundance.description:
Discipline: Warprot
DN: 4
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: The target's torso is swelled by the power of the warp, distorting their form into impossible shapes, but providing an ablative layer of overlapping flesh. Whilst the power is sustained, the target gains +3 Resilience. They also apply +1 DN to all social interaction Tests, except those targeting characters with the NURGLE Keyword. The target gains +1 Corruption for each minute the power is sustained, as daemonic mites make a new home in the target's capacious guts.

Potency: [1] +1 Resilience. [1] Activation reduced to an Action.

grandfathers_alleviation.name: Grandfather's Alleviation
grandfathers_alleviation.description:
Discipline: Warprot
DN: 4
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 10m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: In his infinite benevolence, the Lord of Decay relieves the target of their burdens, be they gunshot wounds, binding restraints, or psychological dismay. Whilst the power is sustained, the target does not suffer DN penalties for being Wounded, is not limited in what actions they can take whilst Dying, and ignores the effects of any Conditions they suffer. However, the target cannot remove Conditions even once their usual time limit has lapsed, still accumulates Traumatic Injuries as normal, and cannot roll Determination if they have exceeded their Maximum Shock. Because this power merely ignores Conditions instead of removing them, the effects and penalties of those Conditions immediately return once the power ends. Returned Conditions can lapse or be healed per the normal rules. The target gains +1 Corruption for each minute the power is sustained, as their untreated debilities start to incubate psychic infection.

Potency: [1] +10m Range. [1] Activation reduced to an Action.

glitching_curse.name: Glitching Curse
glitching_curse.description:
Discipline: Warprot
DN: 4
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 5m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You emit a screech of discordant static, infecting nearby machine spirits with a debilitating virus as contagious as any of Nurgle's biological plagues. Whilst this power is sustained, it affects any Tests by an enemy within range of you that utilises technology, such as an attack with a weapon, movement in power armour, or piloting a vehicle. All affected Tests replace 1 additional die in their pool with a Wrath Die. Whilst rolling extra Wrath Dice, affected targets can only score a Wrath Critical if all dice in their pool score an Exalted Icon. Complications, however, are triggered if any Wrath Dice roll a 1. Complications from infected technology cause glitches like jams, ammo loss, and unplanned activations, which must be corrected with a DN 2 Tech (Int) Test before they can be used again. If a Test affected by this power triggers multiple Complications, the effects are disastrous — the user suffers 1d3 Mortal Wounds, the machine misfires in a manner of your choosing, and the device is inoperable until repaired with a DN 4 Tech (Int) Test.

Potency: [1] +5m Range. [1] +1 DN on Tech (Int) Tests to repair. [2] +1 die converted into Wrath Die.

malodorous_pall.name: Malodorous Pall
malodorous_pall.description:
Discipline: Warprot
DN: 4
XP Cost: 10
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: A cloud of flies and rancid filth settles around the target, obscuring them in a putrid miasma, and assaulting the nostrils of nearby unfortunates. Whilst the power is sustained, any attack Tests against the target, or Tests by enemies Engaged with the target, apply the Hindered (2) Condition (applying +2 DN). The target themselves also applies the same Condition when making Medicae (Int) Tests, Tech (Int) Tests, and social interaction Tests — unless the target of the Test has the NURGLE Keyword. The target gains +1 Corruption for each minute the power is sustained, as the stench of decay leaves a stain on their very soul.

Potency: [1] +1 Hindered Condition (+1 DN on appropriate Tests). [1] Activation reduced to an Action.

stream_of_pestilence.name: Stream of Pestilence
stream_of_pestilence.description:
Discipline: Warprot
DN: Target's Toughness
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You assault the immune system of your target with unholy poxes, lowering their defences against other infections. Whilst the power is sustained, the target suffers the effects of the Poisoned Condition, and takes 1d3 Shock at the start of each Turn. You gain 1 Corruption per minute you sustain this power, as your soul withers along with the target's body.

Potency: [2] +1 Shock inflicted each Turn. [2] +1 DN on Tests whilst Poisoned.

nurgles_rot.name: Nurgle's Rot
nurgles_rot.description:
Discipline: Warprot
DN: 7
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Full-Round Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 5m
Keywords: CHAOS, PSYCHIC

Effect: You unleash the vilest plague known to mortal-kind, whilst praising the Fly Lord's name. The target immediately suffers 1 Corruption and 1d3 Mortal Wounds. Whilst the power is sustained, the target suffers 1d3 Mortal Wounds at the start of each Turn. In addition, any creature who starts their Turn Engaged with the target must make a DN 3 Toughness Test. If they fail, they too become infected — immediately suffering 1 Corruption and 1d3 Mortal Wounds, and suffering 1d3 Mortal Wounds at the start of each subsequent turn. A creature cannot be infected by Nurgle's Rot multiple times at once. When the power ends, every infected target must make a DN 3 Toughness Test. If they fail, the Rot has taken hold, and their fate is sealed. The creature can no longer regain Wounds by any means, and suffers 1 Mortal Wound in each Regroup and Respite. There is no cure for Nurgle's Rot. The character can only hope to postpone the inevitable, whilst fulfilling any outstanding business. It is said that any souls claimed by Nurgle's Rot are seized by the Lord of Decay, and reformed into Plaguebearers to serve in his daemonic legions. Whenever an Adversary or Agent is killed using this power, the GM gains 1 Ruin. Opening oneself to the pestilent power of Nurgle is never without repercussions. You gain 1 Corruption per Round you sustain this power.

Potency: [1] Immediately inflict +1 Mortal Wound. [2] +1 DN on Toughness Tests.

veil_of_time.name: Veil of Time
veil_of_time.description:
Discipline: Librarius
DN: 8
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You channel the Warp to twist the flow of time, unnaturally stretching a single moment. For as long as you Sustain this power, your target may take two Turns in each Round.

might_of_heroes.name: Might of Heroes
might_of_heroes.description:
Discipline: Librarius
DN: 7
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 15m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: Summoning the labyrinthine lore of your Librarius, you bestow the martial might of ancestral Astartes brethren unto your ally, siphoning the Warp to empower their form. Your target gains +1 Strength, Toughness, and Initiative until the start of your next Turn.

Potency: [3] Your target gains an additional +1 Strength, Toughness, and Initiative.

psychic_scourge.name: Psychic Scourge
psychic_scourge.description:
Discipline: Librarius
DN: Target's Willpower
XP Cost: 20
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 20m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You perforate your target's mind, stripping it of information in an incredibly painful and frightening way. To activate this power, you must win an Opposed Willpower Test with your target. If you succeed, you deal 1d3 Mortal Wounds and the target suffers the Fear Condition.

Potency: [3] +1 Mortal Wound.

psychic_fortress.name: Psychic Fortress
psychic_fortress.description:
Discipline: Librarius
DN: 6
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Sustained
Range: 20m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: You fortify your target's mind with multiple mental hexagrammic wards, protecting it from the predations of the Warp and bolstering their bravery. Your target becomes immune to the Fear and Terror Conditions for as long as you Sustain this power. Your target also gains Bonus Dice equal to your Willpower Attribute when they roll Determination against damage caused by a Psychic Power, and may roll Determination against Mortal Wounds caused by Psychic Powers for as long as you sustain this power.

fury_of_the_ancients.name: Fury of the Ancients
fury_of_the_ancients.description:
Discipline: Librarius
DN: 10
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 14m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: Consulting the legendarium of your Librarius, you manifest a monstrosity fought in your Chapter's history and unleash the Warp-borne terror on your enemies. If you successfully activate this power, the Fury of the Ancients travels in a straight line for 14m in a direction you choose. All enemies on that line suffer 2d3 Mortal Wounds.

Potency: [1] +7m Range. [2] +1 Mortal Wound.

null_zone.name: Null Zone
null_zone.description:
Discipline: Librarius
DN: 7
XP Cost: 15
Activation: Action
Duration: Instant
Range: 20m
Keywords: PSYCHIC

Effect: Drawing on the Emperor's own purity, you twist the power of the Warp to temporarily expel its malign influence from a specific area. When you successfully activate this power, select a point or target in range. You create a null zone with a 6m radius centered on that point or target until the start of your next Turn. The DN of all Psychic Mastery (Wil) Tests made within the null zone is increased by your Willpower Rating. The Invulnerable Armour Trait has no effect inside the null zone.

Potency: [1] +10m Range. [2] Double the radius of the null zone.
